lead_paragraph: The ice-dancing team of Tanith Belbin and Benjamin Agosto, and Johnny Weir rallied for victories at the Cup of China in Harbin.Weir, a three-time former American champion, edged the 2007 champion Evan Lysacek in a duel for first place. Belbin and Agosto won in the final free dance, taking advantage of lift penalties to Oksana Domnina and Maxim Shabalin of Russia.
